article_title: Let the good times roll: The Castle attracts regulars of all ages with fun and friends
article_text: Mary Beth Schweigert writes for the Lifestyle section of Lancaster Newspapers. She can be reached at mschweigert@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8757. You can also follow@mbschweigert on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , roller skating, the castle, kurt honabach
article_metadata.author: MARY BETH SCHWEIGERT | Lifestyle Staff

og.description: Nostalgia, fun, friendships and even weight loss have lured plenty of adults back to The Castle Roller Rink.
